banner.html:
Put forward your news.

It can concern your business or your industry.

close.body: If you would like to re-open the chatbox, please refresh the page.
close.title: Close the chatbox?

get.error: We apologize, there was an error with the export.
get.success: The conversation was successfully sent by email.

exportConv.welcome: Please type in your email to receive the conversation:

choices: We did not understand your question
Our answer was not clear enough
The proposed solution did not satisfy you

comment.thanks: Thank you for your detailed feedback!

feedback.question: I'm sorry that I couldn't answer your request. Can you tell us why?

disclaimer.title: Personal data
disclaimer.body:
This dialog box is there to guide you as best as possible on our site.

The information you send us allows us to process your request.

However, no personal or sensitive data that could allow your identification should be communicated in this tool (such as for example information on your state of health, your bank details, your opinions or personal convictions).

get.error: We apologize, there was an error with your GDPR request.
get.success: Your GDPR request has been submitted successfully.

interaction.languageChange: From now on, I will answer you in

steps.body: That way I can provide you with better content.
steps.title: Use at best complete sentences

steps.body: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Curabitur eleifend mauris arcu, at semper tortor eleifend a. Nullam luctus pellentesque.
